title.text: Employed population of age 10 and above according to gender and age breakdown of the major groups of economic activity in 1394
شاغلان ۱۰ ساله و بیش‌تر بر حسب جنس و سن به تفکیک گروه‌های عمده فعالیت اقتصادی در سال ۱۳۹۴

description.text: این داده از صفحات ۱۰۱ تا ۱۱۲ جدول ۱۲، نتایج آمارگیری نیروی کار - ۱۳۹۴، استخراج شده است.
Dataset exctracted from table 12 on pages 101 to 112, Results of the labor force survey in 1394.

title.text: Employed population of age 10 and above according to gender and age breakdown of the major groups of economic activity in 1394
شاغلان ۱۰ ساله و بیش‌تر بر حسب جنس و سن به تفکیک گروه‌های عمده فعالیت اقتصادی در سال ۱۳۹۴

fields.name: Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning (person)
Water supply, waste management, sewage and filtration activities (person)
Wholesale, retail, repair of motor vehicles, motorcycles (person)
Services activities related to providing accommodation and food (person)
Public administration and defence, compulsory social security (person)
Activities of households as employers, separable activities of produce goods and services consumed by normal households for their consumption (person)
